0.2.4.patchnotes: - Fixed all paths to be normalized to '/' to make Archivio compatible with MacOS and Linux - Fixed sub folders being inconsistent depending of the Platform or location. - Automatic Screenshot detection works better on different platforms now. - fixed a bug where creating a new file was not adding number,name,date, but still Inconsistent - Added a smart way to watch for screenshots whatever choice the user do. - Added code base to recognize specific capture Software added in the future, ShareX...
